summary: This is an email forwarding materials for a Deputy Attorney General (DAG) meeting overview, sent to Audrey Strauss, the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York. The document itself is a metadata header showing the email transmission of meeting preparation materials.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York (USANYS)
persons.context: Recipient of an email containing materials for a Deputy Attorney General (DAG) meeting overview.

keyFacts: An email was sent on November 5, 2020, to U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss regarding materials for a DAG (Deputy Attorney General) meeting overview.
The document is an email header showing transmission metadata, indicating the forwarding of preparatory materials for a high-level DOJ meeting.
The email originated from an internal U.S. Department of Justice Outlook system, as indicated by the sender domain.
